description: Manage the Skype Channel on a bot.

commands.name: az bot skype create
commands.summary: Create the Skype Channel on a bot.
commands.syntax:
az bot skype create --name
                    --resource-group
                    [--add-disabled {false, true}]
                    [--calling-web-hook]
                    [--enable-calling {false, true}]
                    [--enable-groups {false, true}]
                    [--enable-media-cards {false, true}]
                    [--enable-messaging {false, true}]
                    [--enable-screen-sharing {false, true}]
                    [--enable-video {false, true}]
                    [--groups-mode]
                    [--location]
examples:
az bot skype create -n botName -g MyResourceGroup --enable-messaging
--enable-screen-sharing

commands.name: az bot skype delete
commands.summary: Delete the Skype Channel on a bot.

commands.name: az bot skype show
commands.summary: Get details of the Skype Channel on a bot.
